head.description: Une communauté d'étudiants passionnée d'informatique et d'innovation.

intro.title: Why IDeA?
intro.subtitle: Why should you contact us
intro.description: We are a team of student who learned how to code and we want to help you to create your project.

subtitle.1: Grâce à nos experiences, we have acquired a lot of skills in different fields.

description.1a: Analyze your data and extract the information you need.
description.1b: Create a machine learning model to predict your data.
description.1c: Create a dashboard to visualize your data.
description.2b: Manage your project from A to Z.
description.2c: Create a website for your project.

description.1: We have already worked on some projects, here are some of them.
description.2: Create a visualization tool of the data of the cinema but also of its competitors on a regular and automated basis.
description.3: Predict the number of visitor of the park by day or night.
description.4: Processing and analysis of data concerning matches and subscriptions through dashboards, and implementation of a customer typology.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: If you still have questions look here

answer.1: Yes, our services are completely free!

footer.description: IDeA is a non-profit organization that promotes the development of various projects in the field of education, culture, art and science.
